blogPost.excerpt: Free Inventory Stock Tracking App gives you the upper hand in your stock management. With no hidden charges, you can employ this feature-packed free app even in offline mode.
blogPost.body: Free Inventory Stock Tracking App gives you the upper hand in your stock management. With no hidden charges, you can employ this feature-packed free app even in offline mode.
blogPost.title: Inventory Stock Tracking App by Zoho - A simple, efficient, and free inventory stock tracking app
blogPost.author: UX Journal

localize.description: 免费库存库存跟踪应用程序给你的库存管理的优势。没有隐藏的费用，你可以采用这个功能丰富的免费应用程序，即使在离线模式。
localize.tagline: 一款简单、高效、免费的盘点库存跟踪应用。

localize.description: 免費庫存庫存跟蹤應用程序給你的庫存管理的優勢。沒有隱藏的費用，你可以採用這個功能豐富的免費應用程序，即使在離線模式。
localize.tagline: 一款簡單、高效、免費的盤點庫存跟蹤應用。

previous.excerpt: On Nugget you’re the DJ of your own audio station. You can pull audio from all over the internet and add your voice to create a station about anything that interests you. You can also leave audio comments on your friends’ posts.
previous.title: Nugget - Share and record audio with your friends

localize.description: 在Nugget上，你是你自己音频站的DJ。你可以从互联网上提取音频，并添加你的声音，创建一个关于任何你感兴趣的站。你还可以在你朋友的帖子上留下音频评论。
localize.tagline: 与朋友分享和录制音频

localize.description: 在Nugget上，你是你自己音頻站的DJ。你可以從互聯網上提取音頻，並添加你的聲音，創建一個關於任何你感興趣的站。你還可以在你朋友的帖子上留下音頻評論。
localize.tagline: 與朋友分享和錄製音頻

next.excerpt: Studio photography is no longer out of reach. Our full photo crew carefully hires models, designs scenes, and captures moments to offer you the best studio stock photos possible. With this new platform, you can find exactly what you need –or create it!
next.title: Moose Photos 3.0 by Icons8 - Free, studio-produced stock photos you can customize

localize.description: 影楼摄影不再遥不可及。我们的全职摄影团队精心聘请模特，设计场景，捕捉瞬间，为您提供最好的影楼图片库。有了这个新平台，你可以准确地找到你所需要的东西--或者创造它!
localize.tagline: 免费，工作室制作的股票照片，你可以定制

localize.description: 影樓攝影不再遙不可及。我們的全職攝影團隊精心聘請模特，設計場景，捕捉瞬間，爲您提供最好的影樓圖片庫。有了這個新平臺，你可以準確地找到你所需要的東西--或者創造它!
localize.tagline: 免費，工作室製作的股票照片，你可以定製
